title: Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu Happy Kiss!
alternative_title: 美男高校地球防衛部HAPPY KISS!
description: With things a bit calmer since the whole Zundar fiasco, the boys can get back to what’s important in life -- like hanging around the bathhouse and being lazy. But when the Loveracelets start calling, they’ll have to jump back into the action.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Parody>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
